sense.def:
To accommodate someone
pomeni tistemu človeku ponuditi prenočišče, stanovanje ali delovni prostor.

seg.quote: She can't accommodate guests at the moment.

sense.def:
To accommodate someone
pomeni nekomu pomagati.

seg.quote: The bank is accommodating its customers more than it used to.
The warder was always accommodating in allowing visitors in.

sense.def:
Kadar stavba lahko
accommodate a number of people or things
je v njej dovolj prostora za določeno število ljudi ali predmetov.
